DOC.brief_summary: The investigators study aim to evaluate the efficacy of PSU heel cushion in treatment of plantar fasciitis. The investigators will do a randomized controlled trial in patient with plantar fasciitis compared with stretching exercise alone. The outcome measurement include heel pain improvement, compliance, satisfaction, foot functional score at 6 months.
DOC.criteria: Patient with plantar fasciitis Rheumatologic problem such as rheumatoid arthritis Latex allergy Pregnancy Previous surgery around foot and ankle
